description: i installed it but it was for nothing xd

I have been using this app to play old spectrum games for over a year now and it is excellent. I love how you load the game into the virtual cassette player and get the feeling of loading and saving to tapes. You can of course speed things up if you don't enjoy the bleeps and bloops of the loading process! The games run flawlessly too! Many thanks to the author!
summary: Excellent way to enjoy your old Spectrum or Amstrad games

description: I love the interface, and it is so easy to use. I am now able to play one of my favorite games on Amstrad: "M'enfin"
Достаточно точная эмуляция, удобный и красивый интерфейс. Множество настроек эмуляции ЭЛТ.
